thread.title: How they've changed! The Kardashian sisters are virtually unrecognisable from their pre-fame past
thread.title_full: How they've changed! The Kardashian sisters are virtually unrecognisable from their pre-fame past

author: Peter Lloyd
title: How they've changed! The Kardashian sisters are virtually unrecognisable from their pre-fame past
text:
Thank you for subscribing!   
They are on our TV screens every single day, so it's perhaps difficult to appreciate quite how much the Kardashian clan has changed in the past decade. 
But there's no denying that Kym, Kylie, Kourtney and Khloe are dramatically different to how they first appeared on the show which catapulted them to fame: Keeping Up With The Kardashians. 
Now, it seems that fans are beginning to realise just show much they've evolved over time - and many of them can't believe it. 
So, to help illustrate this, we've highlighted their metamorphosis here... Kim Kardashian 
Along with dodgy eyebrows, light powder eyeshadow and a distinct lack of contouring, images of Kim during her 16th birthday party are a far cry from her heavily primped and preened look of today. 
But there's no denying that she's undergone quite the transformation in the past 20 years. Further proof of this can be seen in a throwback snap posted by Nick Cannon. 
Nick dated Kim between September 2006 and January 2007 - shortly before her sex tape with Ray J surfaced. The snap, with Paris Hilton, looks almost sweet and innocent. 
She has long denied surgery, but was famously snapped undergoing a vampire facial. Khloe Kardashian 
Having once been a chubby-cheeked brunette, there's certainly no denying that Khloe is a million miles away from her old look. 
Now boasting peroxide blonde locks and a slimmer look, she is the face - and body - of fitness brand Protein World. But she was very different aged 16, as the below snap proves. 
The middle Kardashian sister, 31, recently shared a shot of her celebrating her grandfather's birthday - hands awkwardly by her sides, Khloe smiles at the camera as Krisâ€™ late dad turns around to look at her. 
New-and-improved Khloe has been at the centre of a lot of speculation regarding her transforming looks, with her nose looking more raised than it did in the past. 
The star has directly responded to the rumours this year, insisting: "If I felt like I wanted one, I would've". Kourtney Kardashian 
Like her sisters, Kourtney has also been caught up in the speculation after her look has dramatically changed over the years. 
Although she is yet to comment publicly on whether she has had work to make her nose sharper, she has opened up on getting a boob job. 
Her sister Kim also confirmed it last year when, referring to Caitlyn's breasts after her Vanity Fair photoshoot, she said: "Her boobs were like Kourtney's... when she first got hers done." Kylie Jenner 
She was once the girlish TV star who was more cute than curvaceous. But that's a distant memory for Kylie , who is now a much more grown up version of herself - with a little help. 
The youngest of the Kardashian/Jenner fam insisted for months that her over-sized pout was purely down to changing her make-up but fans were never convinced. 
Eventually, Khloe spilled the beans, saying: "Kylie decided to plump her lips and I don't think there is anything wrong with that. I think if you've done something though, it is right to cop up to it. If you avoid the question you're gonna look like a liar." 
Earlier this week, Kylie's changing appearance became the target of a hilarious new meme that suggests she's only looks as good as she does because of her family's cash. Alongside a picture of her then and now, the meme reads: "This type of puberty is called money." 
The image has been shared thousands of times on social media this week, after Kylie shared a snap of herself posing in a skimpy black bikini. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
